products.name: Butterscotch Flavoured Coffee
products.description: A rich, buttery coffee infused with sweet butterscotch flavor
products.detailedDescription: This blend offers a luscious combination of rich coffee and sweet, buttery butterscotch flavor. Perfect for indulgent coffee breaks and dessert-inspired menus.

specifications.Variant: Strong Inst. Powder, Extra Strong Inst. Powder

products.name: Agglomerated Instant Coffee
products.description: Premium agglomerated instant coffee with rich crema
products.detailedDescription: Designed for instant beverage applications that still demand quality, this agglomerated coffee dissolves quickly while keeping a rich crema and bold taste.

products.name: Freeze Dried Arabica
products.description: Single origin freeze dried coffee with delicate aroma
products.detailedDescription: Freeze drying locks in the delicate floral aroma of this 100% Arabica coffee, delivering a premium instant experience.

products.name: Tea Premix - Cafe Style
products.description: Authentic cafe style tea premix for vending and HoReCa
products.detailedDescription: Balanced chai premix that blends strong Assam CTC tea with milk solids and natural spices for consistent cups in vending machines or cafes.

products.name: Tea Premix - Vending Machine
products.description: High throughput premix tailored for vending operations
products.detailedDescription: Optimized blend that flows well in vending systems and delivers consistent taste even at high volumes.

products.name: Green Coffee Beans - Arabica Cherry
products.description: High elevation Arabica cherry beans ideal for specialty roasting
products.detailedDescription: Shade grown cherries processed using washed method to retain acidity and sweetness. Perfect for roasters who want a balanced cup profile.

products.name: Roasted Beans - Robusta Cherry AAA
products.description: Bold roasted beans with chocolate finish
products.detailedDescription: Custom roasted in small batches, delivering a bold crema-rich espresso base with chocolate and spice notes.

products.name: Instant Iced Tea - Lemon
products.description: Zesty lemon iced tea premix for instant refreshments
products.detailedDescription: Cold soluble instant iced tea premix packed with vitamin C and tangy lemon notes.

products.name: Tea Extract - Green
products.description: High potency green tea extract for nutraceuticals
products.detailedDescription: Standardized extract with 50% polyphenols ideal for capsules, beverages or functional foods.

products.name: Crystal Coffee
products.description: Revolutionary crystal coffee with enhanced clarity and taste
products.detailedDescription: Breakthrough crystallization delivers instant dissolution while maintaining exceptional clarity and pure coffee taste.

products.name: Cold Coffee Premix
products.description: Instant cold coffee premix with a rich creamy taste
products.detailedDescription: Balanced with premium coffee and milk solids, this premix delivers the classic cold coffee taste instantly.

specifications.Variant: Strong Inst. Powder, Extra Strong Inst. Powder
